W07_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired the spirit's power. Head to your next destination.

W07_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You’ve acquired all the spiritual power you need. Time to head back to the heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.

W07_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLESOUL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLESOUL_000_DETAIL.text: You opted not to receive a reward. Was that really the correct choice?

W07_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLESOUL_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLESOUL_001_DETAIL.text: You fought the spirit you already had. Where's the spirit you're meant to find in this world?

W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KA_000_DETAIL.text: Can the power of a fire spirit be acquired in a place like this?

W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_MOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_MOKU_000_DETAIL.text: Can the power of a wood spirit be acquired in a place like this?

W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_000_DETAIL.text: Can the power of a metal spirit be acquired in a place like this?

W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_000_DETAIL.text: Can the power of a water spirit be acquired in a place like this?

W07_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W07_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Cinq: World of the Four Tribes

W07_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found the ruins of what was likely a temple on the other side of the door. Four tribes inhabit this world—and who knows which one can help you track down spirits?
